meanings.definition: Capable of being collapsed or folded.
meanings.sent1: The collapsible chair easily folded for storage.
meanings.sent2: The collapsible table saved space in the small room.
meanings.sent3: The collapsible umbrella folded up neatly in his bag.
meanings.sent4: Her collapsible suitcase collapsed like a deck of cards.
meanings.sent5: The collapsible tent crumpled into a compact bundle.

meanings.definition: Able to be easily folded or compressed.
meanings.sent1: The collapsible map fit perfectly in his pocket.
meanings.sent2: The collapsible stroller made traveling with a baby much easier.
meanings.sent3: The collapsible hat popped open with a spring-loaded surprise.
meanings.sent4: His collapsible wallet shrank to half its size in seconds.
meanings.sent5: The collapsible chair compressed into a tiny package for transport.
